title: Where's The Crust Pizza
directions: Lightly spay a 9Ã—13 baking dish with cooking spray. With a handheld mixer, mix cream cheese, eggs, pepper, garlic powder and parmesan cheese until combined. Spread into baking dish. Bake for 12-15 minutes, our until golden brown. Allow crust to cool for 10 minutes.
Spread pizza sauce on crust. Top with cheese and toppings. Sprinkle pizza with garlic powder. Bake 8-10 minutes, until cheese is melted.
ingredients: 1 (8 oz) package of full fat cream cheese, room temperature
toppings - pepperoni, ham, sausage, mushrooms, peppers
